content.text: Second Half ends, Barcelona B 2, Recreativo 2.
Offside, Barcelona B. Carles Planas tries a through ball, but Marc Bartra is caught offside.
Corner,  Barcelona B. Conceded by Ximo Navarro.
Attempt saved. Marc Bartra (Barcelona B) header from the centre of the box is saved in the top left corner. Assisted by Martín Montoya with a cross.
Foul by Pablo Sánchez (Recreativo).
Martín Montoya (Barcelona B) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt saved. Jonathan dos Santos (Barcelona B) right footed shot from a difficult angle and long range on the left is saved in the centre of the goal.

Carles Planas (Barcelona B) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Ximo Navarro (Recreativo).
